Description: Job Description:We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Sales Executive to join our team in the tiles and sanitary sector. As a Sales Executive, you will be responsible for identifying and nurturing leads, building strong client relationships, and driving sales growth in our product lines. This role offers an exciting opportunity to excel in a competitive market and contribute to the success of our company.Skills
Skills: - Prospect and identify potential clients in the tiles and sanitary industry.
- Proven experience (minimum 2 year) in sales, preferably in the tiles and sanitary industry. ( experience must have in uae only )
